question: Which international air carrier launched the world’s first coronavirus blood test for its passengers, which gives the result in 10 minutes?
explanation:
The largest air carrier of the Middle East region, the Emirates has launched the world’s first 10-minute coronavirus blood test for passengers, who are departing from Dubai.
Limited passenger flights have been operated by the airline form this month for foreign citizens who want to leave the country. But it does not allow passengers to come to its country. The on-site rapid blood tests are being conducted by the Health Authorities of Dubai.
